product_desc: Grey solid boxers, has an elasticated waistband, button fly, 2 pocketsFeatures:This pair of boxer shorts for men offers exceptional comfort that will keep you at ease all day and night. The sleek outer elastic ensures a firm fit at the waist. The 028 style from Levi's 300LS series comes in 4 versatile colors with a melange effect for a modern and hip look.Cotton Twill: This pair of cotton twill boxer shorts is woven with melange yarn. The soft, breathable fabric will keep you at ease throughout the day.Smartskin Technology: Designed to provide a pleasant wearing experience, this innerwear for men is enhanced with unique Smartskin technology. This gives it a super-soft, natural hand feel for day-long comfort.Premium Elastic Waistband: These boxer shorts are designed with premium super-soft elastic waistband for a smoother hand feel and zero skin irritation. The contemporary design ensures the underwear sits snugly and does not ride up, giving you complete coverage.13 Stitches Per Inch: This men's innerwear has been reinforced with 13 stitches per inch using a mix of cotton and polyester sewing threads. This technique strengthens it for durability and long-lasting life.Fashion Meets Function: Equipped with two handy side pockets for functionality and a melange effect for a fashionable look, these men's boxer shorts are the quintessence of style and comfort.
pd_material: 100% cottonMachine WashWash cold and dark colors separatelyDo not iron or bleach
pdp_name: Men Smartskin Technology Woven Cotton Boxer Shorts with Tag Free Comfort #028

comments.comment: Writing this review after almost a months time. Using this garment for quite a while now and I must say the quality of the product is fantastic. No colour fade, no lints, no fabric deformation. It feels as soft and comfortable even after multiple washes as new. And the fit is super comfortable. A must have product for daily essentials. Go for it!!
Bought a damensch product for the first time. And honestly it is a great product. The quality is great for the price and the fit is amazing. If you are thinking about buying these you can't go wrong.

It's good and comfortable fabrics!!!!
The product from DaMENSCH is blowing my mind!!
Feels like i have wear air🌬 such a comfy material

Just go for it!!! You will fall in love with DaMENSCH.

Value for money 5 on 5

The damensch ultralight boxers comes with the elastic stretchable waistband which makes it very comfortable to wear without any stretch marks. It has very premium fitting and comes at a perfect price.
Amazing purchase. Most light fabric, great comfort and quality elastic/stitching. But it with eyes closed.
I used to wear jockey boxers from years and never tried any other brand, but after wearing damensch boxers i can definetly say that you have a new loyal customer. Bye bye jockey.

I will say that this is best boxer i have ever bought. Material is so nice and long lasting. Using this since 2 yrs and the quality is just awesome. They have made really a good product. If you are looking for good boxer then just go for it. Definitely worth buying.
Overall a great product and fabric. I’ve been using it for more than 1 weeks and it is absolutely comfortable. The fabric is light and doesn’t bother you. The fit is great as per the measurement.

Comfort is where these boxers truly shine. The seamless design and tagless construction eliminate any discomfort or chafing, allowing me to forget I’m even wearing them. This is going to my wardrobe .

Bought these for the first time. Fits perfectly! Matte finish material looks premium and feels comfortable.
Very satisfied with the purchase. Will be buying more soon ❤️
Have been wearing Damensch for a while and the fit and fabric is just amazingly comfortable. The colours don't fade and it's just a breeze to wear even in a humid city like Mumbai.

comments.comment:
It is very comfortable. The feeling of lightness can't be explained in words. You should give it a try. Although, it little high on price but its worth every penny spent on it. 

It serves both purpose, as a boxer and also as a shorts.

I am absolutely in love with them! The color is just perfect - a beautiful shade of pink that's both feminine and trendy. The material is also top-notch - it's lightweight and comfortable, perfect for warm weather. 
 I would highly recommend these dusky pink shorts to anyone looking for a stylish and affordable addition to their wardrobe. I'm already planning on purchasing another pair in a different color - they're just that good!

The fit is good but the fabric is very light and kind of transparent. What's the point of having a cool boxer if you can't wear it without wearing something above it. If you wear it and go in a well lit room, others might see you inside stuff 😜. I think the darker colors have a more opaque fabric.

The Product Is Excellent, The Cloth Quality Is Superb. It Same As It Is As Shown In The Display. I Loved It Product Guys. No Need To Worry About Cloth Material And Colour It's Literally Amazing. The DAMENSCH Company Is Good Product Selling And Top Grossing.

Price- in offer i got it at 392 Inr

Quality- it is really superb, pure cotton with very good quality fabric. Its not thin like other brand. I think its good than jockey even. Very comfortable. Your body will feel free free . Stitching is also strong . Loved the product ordered on 2 colors. Pink and blue.

I feel the quality and fitting is just perfect. It wouldn’t be wrong if I call their product better premium quality and better than other brands. Totally my personal opinion.
